channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Comic Book Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Comic Book Management System

item.title: CVE-2022-3856|2024-08-03T01:20:58.384Z -- unknown -- comic%20book%20management%20system
item.description: The Comic Book Management System WordPress plugin before 2.2.0 does not sanitize and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as Admin.
